Hello,

I have installed the latest WPF Toolkit binaries.  They are installed in "C:\Program Files\WPF Toolkit\v3.5.40619.1".

I add a reference to WPFToolkit to my WPF project.  (Note that the version is shown as 3.5.40128.1.)

I build the project and copy the .exe to a different directory.  When I try to run the .exe, I get the message: "Could not load file or assembly 'WPFToolkit, version=3.5.40128.1 ...' or one of its dependencies.  The system cannot find the file specified. ..."

Have I done something wrong with the installation, or do I have to distribute wpftoolkit.dll with my application?

Thanks for any advice...

C:\Program Files\WPF Toolkit\v3.5.40619.1
